title: GIONEE Max Pro (Blue, 32 GB)  (3 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, USB Cable, Screen Guard, Warranty Card, User Manual
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B8, 4G FDD: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD: B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP + 2MP AF Dual Rear Camera, Features: Bokhe Mode, HDR Mode, Slow Motion Mode, Panoroma Mode
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Powerful Battery for Long-lasting Usage: This mobile phone features a 6000 mAh battery so that you get to stay connected and never miss out on anything important when it comes to your work or anything else.
product_description.Ultra-max View: Thanks to the 16.56cm (6.52) HD+ Full view dewdrop display, you will be delighted to an expansive view of your favourite movie, game, and more. It will give you an immersive viewing experience.
product_description.Ample Storage Space: This mobile phone is equipped with 3 GB of RAM and 32 GB of ROM so that you can enjoy lag-free usage. With an expandable memory of up to 256 GB, you can enjoy enough storage space for all your favourite apps and other essentials.
product_description.Delightful Cameras: This mobile phone features a 13 MP + 2 MP (Bokeh Lens) Dual Rear Camera that you can use to capture stunning images of everything around you. You can also use the 8 MP Front Camera to take mesmerising selfies so that you can freeze all your favourite memories in time.
product_description.Experiment with Photography and More: This mobile phone offers features such as Slow-motion, Time Lapse, Face Beauty Mode, HDR Mode, Bokeh Mode, and AI Scene Recognition so that you can play around with photography and videography by adding aesthetic touches to the content.
product_description.Google Assistant: This mobile aims to make life easy for you via its Google-powered assistant. Simply press a key and ask the Google assistant to get the information you seek or ask it to carry out a task for you. You can get navigation assistance, play your favourite song, and more.
product_description.Octa-core Processor: This mobile phone features an Octa-core processor so that you can efficiently multitask with ease and efficiency.
product_description.Android 10: With Android 10, you can enjoy smooth usage that will help you stay entertained and productive.
product_description.Face Unlock: You can use your face to unlock this mobile phone. This way, you can enjoy heightened security and your privacy will stay protected so that you don’t have to worry.
product_description.Strong Mobile Phone: This mobile phone has undergone up to 3000 tests to ensure powerful and tough performance.
product_description.Eye-catching Design: This mobile phone features a bright design that includes a seamless gradient so that you can make a statement wherever you go.
